description.S1: Enter the soundstage and put on a show.

blurb.B1: Head inside the now open door and move to the quest marker to automatically initiate dialogue with the Actor
blurb.B2: at the end of the scene,
blurb.B3: you can <Attack> and kill all of the actors,
blurb.B4: or you can choose any other option to end the scene peacefully.
blurb.B5: Either way you'll gain 9000 XP and Maverick will want to speak to you.

blurb.B1: Maverick will be impressed with your audition if you pass at least two out of three of the Lie (40), Intimidate (65), and Intimidate (100) checks,
blurb.B2: regardless of what other choices you make.
blurb.B3: Alternatively, if you kill the actors he will be impressed no matter what.

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: Well, well! Here to stop us at last, Captain Steele? You're too late!

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: All of this settlement's C&P HungryTime Food Pills - same nutritional value, but now with added filler - are ours!

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: With their patented stomach-stuffing effects and baseline vitamin content, we'll be nigh unstoppable!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Joke's on you, idiot. Those crates are just decoys.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You foul pirate! I won't let you get away with this.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Whatever, as long as you stop monologuing about it.

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: They- they are?

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: ...What an unexpected twist! You may have fooled me for now, but not for long!

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: Do you remember the last time we faced each other? The Battle of Axajaxx, staring one another down across the void of space while flaming debris fell like rain around us?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What of it?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Remain stoically silent.>

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: The things you just described are scientifically impossible.

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: What indeed!

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: I had you surrounded and outgunned! But you overcame my superior numbers with tactical thinking and a Hammersmith Limited Edition Grenade Launcher!

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: I've been waiting for five years now, and at last my day for vengeance has come!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You ran like a coward then. You'll run now if you know what's good for you.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That's what you think!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Exude wordless fury.>

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Is this where we're dumping backstory? Because that should come up earlier.

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: I- oh, I just got chills.

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: ...But still, you'll not stop me now!

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: I have this whole port wired with submicro energon transistors!

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: Once we're away, I'll activate the gamma particulate field, and the quantoponic chain reaction will turn this whole place into vaporized plasma!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Not if I have anything to say about it!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Say nothing, but make your eye twitch a little.>

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Most of those words are made up, and the ones that are real don't work like that.

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: Oh, but there's nothing you can do!

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: I hope you've paid your burial fees and signed your personal death and dismemberment waivers, because this is the end for you!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: No, it's the end for YOU.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Let's see you try!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: FINALLY.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Attack> Rehearsal's over.

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: I- Law, what a presence! I'm going to need a moment to match this energy.

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: To the break room, everyone! I need my Mo-App Fizzy Tea.

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: I- line? Never mind, I think that's scene.

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: You're not even taking this seriously!

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: I refuse to work like this! I've done aetherwave spots for Wentsworth, I'll have you know.

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: He's really shooting! Safeties off!

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: Speechless, I see! It is a flawless plan.

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: And I spent three hours learning how to pronounce them!

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: Yes! It is!

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: Yes, even you are powerless this time, Steele!

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: We screen tested that, and the audiences forgot all about it!

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: I see you haven't changed a bit, Steele.

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: Hey, I didn't write this. Just go with it.

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: Here to stop us at last, Captain Steele? You're too- oh, sorry, I already said that.

dialog.speaker: ActorLeader (Male)
dialog.utterance: Come on, stick to the script!
